    A cube implemented using planes and CSG.

    A CSG node combines two CSG solids using a set operation, such as intersection, addition, or subtraction.
    CSGPlane
    A plane for CSG operations.
    CSGSolid
    A CSG solid object that can be intersected by a ray.
